backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with access-controlled user profiles, product defaults, and order storage with ID management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing product-loading resilience and improved error diagnostics with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, pages, hooks, styling, and admin utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining warm color variables and dark mode overrides with base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA manifest, meta tags, and root script mount.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, orientation, and icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining customer and admin layouts, navigation, and global providers.
Component showing install prompts or instructions based on device and PWA installability state.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Shows an access denied message for non-admins with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLayou: Provides the admin panel layout and routes to orders, rates, and products pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Guards admin routes by checking admin status and denying access on failure.
frontend/src/components/AdminOrderMessag: Shows a banner for admins when new orders exist, with actions to mark them seen or navigate to orders.
frontend/src/components/GooglePayQrSecti: Generates and displays a Google Pay UPI QR code with copyable payment details and fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/PaymentDetailsSe: Displays payment method, flow type, and payee details from a PaymentInfo object.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Defines static payment configuration for UPI/Google Pay and helper getters.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddToHomeScreen.ts: Tracks PWA installability and provides a method to trigger the install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrdersPolling: Polls admin order data, computes new order counts, and marks orders as seen.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicActor.ts: Creates a public backend actor using Internet Identity, handling retries and exposing loading/error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for products, orders, and order creation using public or authenticated actors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with a warm color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrderDetailsPage: Displays detailed admin view of a single order with payment info, customer details, and copyable Rapido note.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrdersPage.tsx: Shows a sortable admin orders table with metadata and navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing products, including creation, bulk upload, and authentication handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRatesPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing, editing, and saving product prices with authentication and refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with latest prices, handles missing products, and allows item removal or clearing the cart.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout flow that validates cart items, collects user info, loads profiles if logged in, and submits orders.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Static contact page showing phone number, business hours, and brand description.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page with hero section, product highlights, and navigation to products and contact pages.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Fetches and displays order details, handles errors and invalid IDs, and provides payment and pickup information.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Admin-only page allowing users to search for an order by ID, fetch details, and display payment and order info with error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays a product list with loading, error, retry handling, and lets users add items to the cart with toast notifications.
frontend/src/state/cart/CartContext.tsx: Provides cart state management including add/update/remove items, persistence in sessionStorage, and price syncing.
frontend/src/state/cart/cartTypes.ts: Defines the CartItemType interface containing product name, price, and quantity.
frontend/src/utils/adminLastSeenOrders.t: Manages admin last-seen order tracking via localStorage and counts new orders based on timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/cartPricing.ts: Calculates cart totals using latest product prices and flags missing products.
frontend/src/utils/errorDisplay.ts: Sanitizes and formats error messages by normalizing text and redacting sensitive data.
frontend/src/utils/payment.ts: Provides payment utilities including payee validation, UPI URI generation, and formatting structured payment info for order notes.
frontend/src/utils/productUpload.ts: Parses product upload strings as JSON or CSV, validating required fields and building Product objects.
frontend/src/utils/qr/encodeQrToSvg.ts: Generates a deterministic QR code as SVG and provides a helper to convert SVG strings to data URLs.
frontend/src/utils/rapidoPickupNote.ts: Formats a Rapido pickup note from an Order, including ID, contact info, address, and item list.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, issues, and requests related to improving product loading reliability.
